tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name TEXT,
    research_area TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
   reactor_id INT,
   experiment_id INT,
   temperature FLOAT,
   pressure FLOAT,
   time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE simulation_results (
   simulation_id INT,
   reactor_id INT,
   simulation_duration FLOAT,
   simulation_date DATE,
   simulation_output TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_findings (
   analysis_id INT,
   reactor_id INT,
   finding_type VARCHAR(255),
   finding_description TEXT,
   findings_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  reactor_id INT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE simulation_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  simulation_id INT,
  reactor_id INT,
  result_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_findings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_id INT,
  reactor_id INT,
  finding TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  affiliation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ExperimentalData (
  researcher_id INT,
  experiment_id INT,
  reactor_id INT,
  data_time TIMESTAMP,
  data_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisFindings (
  analysis_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  reactor_id INT,
  analysis_time TIMESTAMP,
  analysis_result TEXT
);
